channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Apple potentially acquiring Perplexity could be big news for its stock
item.description: The tech giant could find a way out of the “penalty box” and cure the perception that it’s an AI laggard.

item.title: Tesla’s stock is giving back its robotaxi gains. Here’s what happened.
item.description: A technical roadblock got in the way of Tesla shares’ robotaxi run.

item.title: Carnival’s stock jumps as strong last-minute bookings fuel another earnings beat
item.description: Carnival’s stock was surging to pace the S&P 500’s gainers, as strong last-minute bookings helped fuel an earnings beat and raised the cruise line’s o...

item.title: Is Circle Internet’s stock too pricey after a 700% rally since its IPO? This analyst thinks so.
item.description: Circle Internet’s stock fell after an analyst set a price target that implies an 18% decline.

item.title: We’re living in ‘end times’ when you can’t retire on $1 million
item.description: Inflation is the dry rot that eats away at your dreams while you’re busy planning your retirement.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
